Articles.Content: As the title said, nothing more. What do you think about guys?
Only if we get bigger ion engines and more solar panels shapes ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Only if we get bigger ion engines and more solar panels shapes ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

For the solar panels i'm with you, but i don't know for bigger Ion, maybe a 1.25mt one then stop. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
